title: Need help identifying this typeface
content:
My friend has asked me to find this typeface (the one in red) or something very similar to it. I'm assuming he wants a tattoo of it or something of the like, I don't really know. It's definitely not the most attractive by far, but he's a friend so I thought I would help him out.

Any suggestions?

ps- my apologies for the horrid image size.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001243im_/http:/typophile.com/files/l_849394e329a8112da81f1490ce2280c2_4390.jpg)
author: AdamJones87

comments.content:
There are likely a lot of freebie fonts out there - try searching for "electric" or "zap".

It's close to this commercial face, Sticky Fingers from ComicCraft:

[http://www.comicbookfonts.com/fonts/DL/catalog.html?item=fonts:dl246&sid...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001243/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/fonts/DL/catalog.html?item=fonts:dl246&sid=0001KVNQ7HTXEhQbjw905L7 "http://www.comicbookfonts.com/fonts/DL/catalog.html?item=fonts:dl246&sid=0001KVNQ7HTXEhQbjw905L7")
